name: Black Souls with White Shadows
description: Black Souls With White Shadows is an RPG genre video game that is being developed by Gabriel Martinez Aluart,and distributed by uniformspy. In this demo you can see some of the gameplay, graphics, and story. The project has a release date for April this year. As game data it has been said that it will have a karma system, the decisions made in the campaign will change the story and its ending, you can recruit partners both by paying them and doing them favors, the The world will be huge and full of primary and secondary missions, it will have many many bosses and many mini-bosses and it has an economy that revolves around gold, and, as we can buy, we can sell what we do not want.
